name: Finials Bar Stool with Rope Seat
description: The Finials Bar Stool with Rope Seat, was inspired by the timeless charm of European chair design, reimagined to create a contemporary bar stool. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this bar stool combines beauty, comfort, and functionality to create a stool you can relax on when sharing lifes moments at the kitchen counter. The Bar Stool's frame is crafted from solid teakwood, featuring finial details on the stool's back. The vintage-inspired detail adds delicacy to the appearance of the stool designed to add an interesting contrast to the textural rope seat. Handmade in Indonesia by skilled craftsmen.
